item.title: Report E-2024050232
item.description:
Report E-2024050232

Identified by scraper @ 2024-05-13T15:12:55+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-05-07
  • City: SAINT PETERS
  • State: MO
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: DAYTON FREIGHT LINES, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: Dayton Freight personnel observed approximately fifty (50) gallons of material released from two (2) 50-gallon metal drums. The released material impacted the other freight in the trailer due to vehicle accident that filled the trailer. Dayton Freight personnel cleaned up the released material and containerized the waste. The generated waste will remain onsite for Dayton Freightâ€™s contracted hazardous waste vendor to coordinate disposal.
